Text:
Hey, thanks for uploading these jre podcasts! thats awesome, keep up the good work!

Just wondering though, ive downloaded the torrent file with "vuze" which has stored on my computer as an "OGG" file.. how do i download these torrents to listen to them in mp3 format??

Thanks again

Hey dude!!
No problem.

Its in the ogg vorbis audio format, not mp3 :)
You can play it with almost any mediaplayer out there, although if you have a mac and use itunes you need a plugin from xiph:
http://www.xiph.org/quicktime/download.html

If you use a android smartphone its supported from start, just play the ogg file in any audioplayer.

If you are using windows i recommend vlc:
http://www.videolan.org

Good luck!!

oh ok, cool i'll give that a go then..

cheers!
